slideOne.title: Elevate Your Training with Personal Performance Tracking
slideOne.description: Take control of your fitness journey with our advanced performance tracking features.

slideTwo.title: Tailored Workouts for Your Unique Goals

slideThree.description: You're not alone on your fitness journey. Connect with a supportive community of trainers and peers who share your goals and challenges.
